name: arcgis.sdi.abudhabi.ae
description: Official geospatial data portal for the Abu Dhabi Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI), providing REST endpoints for accessing fundamental geospatial datasets maintained by relevant government organizations. The portal supports wide-ranging e-government programs and features a metadata catalog for standardized access to data such as cadastral, orthoimagery, elevation, transportation, land use, soils, and utility networks.
owner_name: Abu Dhabi Government (SDI and associated agencies)
